_header: Now worshipful sovereigns that sitten here in sight
_description: Epilogue to a Miracle Play — two stanzas ababbcbcbdddb and one abab

BodTan407.First Lines:
Now wursheppful souereyns þat syttyn here in sythlordys and
                    ladyes and frankelens in fay…
BodTan407.Last Lines:
…vnto holy chirche to ben in cressementalle that excedith
                    þe costes of oure play
